title: Night trains linking Paris to Vienna and Berlin to end as France cuts subsidies

title: Italy's Meloni hardens rhetoric after killing of Charlie Kirk

title: 'Zucman tax': The great fear of France's ultra-rich
subhead: Amid budget negotiations, the idea of a tax on the wealth of the ultra-rich is provoking an outcry from those affected, even though it is widely supported by the left and backed by public opinion.

title: How can Europe withstand pressure from Russia and the US? Two experts debate

title: Relationship sex: Why many women still feel pressure to say yes
subhead: Many women have sex with their partners even when they do not want to, out of reluctance to say no, uncertainty about desire, or fear of offending. Together, these reasons sketch the contours of a gray zone of consent.
